channel.title: Php Phone Internet Sites Juggling Phones Ella on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Php Phone Internet Sites Juggling Phones Ella on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: skype. long distance. radio waves. and yoyos
item.description: this weekend was a good time. I flew to minneapolis to engage in a juggling festival. it ruled. I saw lots of cool friends. sadly tomorrow is work. hey all my far away friends (i.e. bec, miriam and ella) I am now on skype - you should "skype me" - or call - or whatever. I hooked my bluetooth headset up to my mini mac and now have a fanciful "voipish" internet phone.
